channel.title: Zombie Freeman
channel.description: It seems my Freeman character is a Zombie. His flesh has gaping wounds. Also, I can't replenish my health or suit juice at the recharge stations. What is going on?

item.title: Zombie Freeman
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Known issue caused by an update. Start a new game on the chapter you’re in to resolve. This has been answered multiple times. Please search before asking.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Freeman
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
actually, depending on what chapter you are on, you can easily just open up the dev console and type in “map cXaX” (X being the number).

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Freeman
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
You have to start a new game, from any chapter should do.

The zombie hands is actually a perfectly reasonable idea considering there’s a zombie MP playermodel. It’s a glitch, not intended for SP.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Freeman
item.dc:creator: jpk
item.description:
I tried doing the remedies suggested like going back to the previous chapter . That did not work. I will probably have to start the game all over again from the beginning. I was also having issues with the charging stations . But, I will start from the beginning to see what happens. Who’s idea was the zombie hands. Seems kind of…well stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Freeman
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Fixing Issues with Latest Patch (Content Update 0.1.0)

search feature plz

Read full topic
